name: Oh no! Another Timeline!
description:
Oh no! Another Timeline! is a funny platformer game  where a witty scientist must find his way in an hazardous laboratory to bring to his boss  the most important substance on earth.

Navigating the lab won't be easy but the Assistant can count on some wonderful ly vintage devices that  give him the ability to  manipulate the spacetime continuum.

Development and Art by FrancoStanco.

Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio.

This game was created during the Brackeys GAme Jam 2020
